text:
Any SVG is rendered to screen skewed.  It appears as though the data is 
offset slightly, like the width for the data is set incorrectly.  If that doesn't 
happen then there are just white lines across the screen.  I don't know if 
this is a bug with Batik or with the JRE on the system.  I have done a lot of 
image rendering and drawing with java on the system and had no trouble 
so I suspect it is Batik.  I  have some screenshots available here:
http://www.isoarpro.com/images/batik1.png
http://www.isoarpro.com/images/batik2.png

I am running MacOSX 10.0 I belive it is Batik 1.1rc3. 
java version "1.3.0"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.3.0, mixed mode)
creator: control@isoarpro.com
tkormann@apache.org
text: MacOS X JDK implementation specific problem.
